ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bravery
ygData.msgSnippet: I made it from once from Ak Anon to Freeport with a level 2 gnome enchanter....It took, umm, many many tries. No buffs. Highhold Pass was like a giant puzzle.
ygData.messageBody:
I made it from once from Ak'Anon to Freeport with a level 2 gnome
enchanter....It took, umm, many many tries. No buffs.
Highhold Pass was like a giant puzzle. Great fun. I have done it many
times since, but the first time was the most fun. Things killed me in
Kithicor that I had never seen before. Yee haw!

Spoken
Gnome Enchanter, Quellious
***
Sean
http://www.wehatesnoring.com


At 05:29 PM 10/19/01 +0100, you wrote:
>Funny you should mention that - When I was setting out on the second part
>- from Rivervale to Freeport, some guy stopped me just before I entered
>Kithicor because it was 1am, he told me to wait till morning, so i
>did. He he, after how far i'd come it would have been very annoying to
>get killed there.
>
> btw - Ralwen made it to Kelethin so say hi if you're in the
> neighbourhood - most peopole there don't believe that a lv6 could foot it
> alone from Qeynos, even with the assist through highpass, tho to be
> honest, with Selo's most of the zones were easy, especially once i got to
> the Commons.
>
>Cheers
>Ralwen
>Bard of the 6th verse
>Torvonnilous
>
>Hmmm, I tend to be very cautious because I hate CRs so I don't
>know.... Maybe the stupidest thing I do often is running through Kithicor
>at any time of the night. I just get a sow and run up on the side of the
>hill as fast as I can and never look back. So far, I've been lucky and
>I've been doing this since my mid teen levels. Have a friend who says I'm
>crazy and I should wait until day.
>
>Lesamlam
>40th Enchanter
>Torvonnilous
>
